text: [Music]
most uh countries have various programs
in place for retirement for what happens
when you get sick what happens when you
get unemployed but what um what is
different in our system is that all of
these are extremely broad-based that
means that if you become unemploy
and you leave one company and you take a
job in another one you do not lose your
retirement benefits in contrast for
instance to the aut workers in America
today if your company goes bankrupt you
can still rely on a steady stream of
income to finance your food on the table
your medical
bills uh also when you become 80 years
old that provides a security a safety
net that means that the fear of
unemployment is not that violent the
fear of change is not that strong and uh
my experience is that that makes our
economy more flexible more
adaptable and uh that there is a general
sense that globalization works for the
benefit of most people and for the
country as a hold in spite of the fact
that it brings change for many people
the burden of of change is shared by all
it's not put entirely on the shoulders
of the few individuals that are affected
by closures
